channel.title: Univision on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Univision on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: TelevisaUnivision Quarterly U.S. Ad Revenue Drops 2 Percent, Streamer ViX Tops 10M Subscribers
item.description: The Spanish-language media giant, led by CEO Daniel Alegre, had last week warned of U.S. advertising “softness” and foreign exchange impacts.

item.title: TelevisaUnivision Quarterly U.S. Ad Revenue Drops 2 Percent, Streamer ViX Tops 10M Subscribers
